examples: You should enter marriage for love.

definitions.definition: A union of two or more people that creates a family tie and carries legal, social, and/or religious rights and responsibilities.

subdefinitions.definition: The union of only two people, to the exclusion of all others.
The union of two people of opposite sex, to the exclusion of all others.

definitions.definition: A wedding ; a ceremony in which people wed .
examples: You are cordially invited to the marriage of James Smith and Jane Doe.

definitions.definition: A king and a queen , when held as a hand in some versions of poker or melded in pinochle .
In solitaire or patience games, the placing a card of the same suit on the next one above or below it in value.
A homosexual relationship between male prisoners .

main_definition: The state of being married . [from 14th c. ]
secondary_definitions: A union of two or more people that creates a family tie and carries legal, social, and/or religious rights and responsibilities. [from 14th c. ]
A wedding ; a ceremony in which people wed . [from 14th c. ]
( card games ) A king and a queen , when held as a hand in some versions of poker or melded in pinochle .
( card games ) In solitaire or patience games, the placing a card of the same suit on the next one above or below it in value.
( prison slang ) A homosexual relationship between male prisoners .
